```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
```


```{r}
data_A <- read.table(file="A-Optimal.txt",header=T)
data_D <- read.table(file="D-Optimal.txt",header=T)
data_E <- read.table(file="E-Optimal.txt",header=T)
```

```{r}
ggplot(data_A,aes(N)) +
  geom_line(aes(y=X2,colour="P=2")) +
  geom_line(aes(y=X3,colour="P=3")) +
  geom_line(aes(y=X5,colour="P=5")) +
  geom_line(aes(y=X10,colour="P=10")) +
  labs(x = "Number of Variables", y = "Copmute Time (s)", title = "A-Optimal (a = -1, b = 1)") + 
  theme(legend.position = c(0.2,0.8)) + 
  scale_color_manual("", values = c("P=2" = "green", "P=3" = "yellow", "P=5" = "red", "P=10" = "blue"))

ggplot(data_D,aes(N)) +
  geom_line(aes(y=X2,colour="P=2")) +
  geom_line(aes(y=X3,colour="P=3")) +
  geom_line(aes(y=X5,colour="P=5")) +
  geom_line(aes(y=X10,colour="P=10")) +
  labs(x = "Number of Variables", y = "Copmute Time (s)", title = "D-Optimal (a = -1, b = 1)") + 
  theme(legend.position = c(0.2,0.8)) + 
  scale_color_manual("", values = c("P=2" = "green", "P=3" = "yellow", "P=5" = "red", "P=10" = "blue"))

ggplot(data_E,aes(N)) +
  geom_line(aes(y=X2,colour="P=2")) +
  geom_line(aes(y=X3,colour="P=3")) +
  geom_line(aes(y=X5,colour="P=5")) +
  geom_line(aes(y=X10,colour="P=10")) +
  labs(x = "Number of Variables", y = "Copmute Time (s)", title = "E-Optimal (a = -1, b = 1)") + 
  theme(legend.position = c(0.2,0.8)) + 
  scale_color_manual("", values = c("P=2" = "green", "P=3" = "yellow", "P=5" = "red", "P=10" = "blue"))
```
